text: vanankalilum, pumiyilum ulla yavum niccayamaka allahvukke contam enpatai arintu kolvirkalaka! Ninkal enta nilaiyil irukkinrirkalo atai avan (nanku) arivan; melum avanitattil avarkal mittappatum an nalil avan, avarkal (im'maiyil) enna ceytu kontiruntarkal enpataiyum avarkalukku arivippan - melum, allah ellap porulkal parriyum nankaripavan
